item.title: A Manager's FAQ
item.description: This is an insightful list from Henry Ward: How do I get employees to perform better? Tell them what they are doing well. How do I give negative feedback? By being curious. How do I decide what to delegate? Delegate the work you want to do. How should I prioritize? Fix problems. Then prevent problems. How should I grade employees? Don’t. Teach them to self-evaluate. When do I fire somebody?
